text: The DMV is charged with helping to improve the District of Columbia's economic competitiveness and quality of life by fostering the safe operation of motor vehicles on District streets in accordance with applicable laws and regulations.
historical:
Prior Codifications

1981 Ed., § 40-152.

Emergency Act Amendments

For temporary addition of chapter, see note to § 50-901.

For temporary (90-day) addition of Chapter 1A, see notes following § 50-901.

Legislative History of Laws

For legislative history of D.C. Law 12-175, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 50-901.

Miscellaneous Notes

Application of D.C. Law 12-175: See Historical and Statutory Notes following § 50-901.

DC CODE § 50-902

Current through December 11, 2012

title.text: Motor and Non-Motor Vehicles and Traffic. (Refs & Annos)
